Sns.Subject: ALARM: AWS/123456789012/my-project - [production][api-service][us-east-1]
Sns.Message:
Name: my-project-api-cpu-alarm

Description: CPU utilization is too high

Project: my-project

State Change: OK -> ALARM

Reason for State Change: Threshold Crossed: 1 out of the last 1 datapoints [85.5 (03/02/26 19:30:00)] was greater than the threshold (80.0) (minimum 1 datapoint for OK -> ALARM transition).

Timestamp: 2026-02-03T19:30:00.000Z

AWS Account: 123456789012

Alarm Arn: arn:aws:cloudwatch:us-east-1:123456789012:alarm:my-project-api-cpu-alarm

Alarm Link: https://us-east-1.console.aws.amazon.com/cloudwatch/home?region=us-east-1#alarmsV2:alarm/my-project-api-cpu-alarm
